item.description: https://www.facebook.... please join me at my home for a home brew beer tasting (I WILL ALSO HAVE WINE) and phone banking event where we will be making calls on behalf of Ron Paul. but why just make phone calls when you can make phone calls while drinking some home brew beer! so please join me in supporting Ron Paul! oh yea, punch and pie. more people will come if they think we have punch and pie Brandon's house: 30 Billerica Street, Lowell, he is the house in the back (just look for the Ron Paul sign)
item.name: Lowell Homebrew and Phonebank
